{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Account Officer",
  "description": "Triton International Company Limited is a reputable organization committed to excellence in service delivery and operational efficiency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location:&nbsp;Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Account Officer to join our finance team and support our growing operations.


Key Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records and update accounting systems.
	Prepare and reconcile bank statements, invoices, and financial reports.
	Process accounts payable and receivable transactions.
	Assist in budgeting, forecasting, and financial analysis.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant financial regulations.
	Support internal and external audits.
	Perform any other accounting duties assigned by management.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	1 - 3 years of experience in an accounting role.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, or similar).
	Strong analytical and numerical skills.
	Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
	Good communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;hr@tritonicl.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Account Officer&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",

Account Officer Job at Triton International Company Limited




        
    

        
        Triton International Company Limited is a reputable organization committed to excellence in service delivery and operational efficiency.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Maryland, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive Account Officer to join our finance team and support our growing operations.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Maintain accurate financial records and update accounting systems.
	Prepare and reconcile bank statements, invoices, and financial reports.
	Process accounts payable and receivable transactions.
	Assist in budgeting, forecasting, and financial analysis.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant financial regulations.
	Support internal and external audits.
	Perform any other accounting duties assigned by management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field.
	1 - 3 years of experience in an accounting role.
	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, or similar).
	Strong analytical and numerical skills.
	Excellent attention to detail and accuracy.
	Good communication and organizational skills.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hr@tritonicl.com using “Account Officer” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist / Secretary",
  "description": "Lance Trend is a major distributor of technology products and Services for businesses in Nigeria, as well as partners with various ICT, manufacturers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist / Secretary

Job Location:&nbsp;Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	A Secretary / Receptionist is responsible for managing front-office operations, handling communications, and providing administrative support to ensure smooth daily functioning of theorganization.


Responsibilities
Front Desk Management:


	Greet and assist visitors, clients, and staff in a professional manner.
	Answer, screen, and forward phone calls; take messages when necessary.
	Maintain a welcoming reception area.


Administrative Support:


	Handle typing, filing, photocopying and scanningtasks.
	Schedule and confirm appointments or meetings.
	Maintain office records, databases, and filing systems.
	Process incoming and outgoing mail.


Communication:


	Draft and distribute correspondence such as emails, memos, and letters.
	Relay information between departments and external contacts


Operational Assistance:


	Monitor office supplies and place orders when needed.
	Support HR or management with clerical tasks.
	Coordinate travel arrangements and meeting logistics.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND qualification with 1-3 years of exxperience.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Soft Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication, organizational ability, multitasking, and customer service orientation.
	Experience: Prior experience in administrative or receptionist roles ispreferred.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@lancetrend.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-12-20",

  },

Receptionist / Secretary Job at Lance Trend




        
    

        
        Lance Trend is a major distributor of technology products and Services for businesses in Nigeria, as well as partners with various ICT, manufacturers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist / Secretary

Job Location: Ketu, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	A Secretary / Receptionist is responsible for managing front-office operations, handling communications, and providing administrative support to ensure smooth daily functioning of theorganization.


Responsibilities
Front Desk Management:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet and assist visitors, clients, and staff in a professional manner.
	Answer, screen, and forward phone calls; take messages when necessary.
	Maintain a welcoming reception area.


Administrative Support:


	Handle typing, filing, photocopying and scanningtasks.
	Schedule and confirm appointments or meetings.
	Maintain office records, databases, and filing systems.
	Process incoming and outgoing mail.


Communication:


	Draft and distribute correspondence such as emails, memos, and letters.
	Relay information between departments and external contacts


Operational Assistance:


	Monitor office supplies and place orders when needed.
	Support HR or management with clerical tasks.
	Coordinate travel arrangements and meeting logistics.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an OND / HND qualification with 1-3 years of exxperience.
	Technical Skills: Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Soft Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication, organizational ability, multitasking, and customer service orientation.
	Experience: Prior experience in administrative or receptionist roles ispreferred.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should send their CV to: hr@lancetrend.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
